title: 这些东西都是你选购的吗

conversations.english: Are these all yours?
conversations.chinese: 这些全都是你要买的东西吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, they are.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，它们是。

title: 我想买一些新疆葡萄

conversations.english: Can I help you, sir?
conversations.chinese: 先生，我可以为您服务吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I want to buy some grapes.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我想买一些葡萄。

title: 吃普通颜色蛋黄的鸡蛋更健康

conversations.english: Can I help you?
conversations.chinese: 我能为您效劳吗？
conversations.reply_english: I'd like two kilos of eggs.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想要两公斤鸡蛋。

title: 我想多买点儿新鲜水果

conversations.english: Wow! Your fruit looks really fresh! How much are these apples?
conversations.chinese: 哇！你的水果看起来真新鲜！这些苹果多少钱？
conversations.reply_english: The apples are 30NT each. How many would you like?
conversations.reply_chinese: 这些苹果一个三十元。你要几个？

title: 请问还有购物车吗

conversations.english: Excuse me, are there any more shopping carts?
conversations.chinese: 打扰了，还有购物车吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, you can find it at the entrance.
conversations.reply_chinese: 有的，你可以在入口处找到它。

title: 我去超市要给家里带点儿什么回来

conversations.english: I'm planning on going to the market soon.
conversations.chinese: 我打算一会儿去超市。
conversations.reply_english: What are you buying?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你在买什么？

title: 你知道怎么选购芒果吗

conversations.english: Can you tell me about some good deals on produce?
conversations.chinese: 能告诉我这里有没有在打折的食物？
conversations.reply_english: The mangoes are on sale today.
conversations.reply_chinese: 今天芒果打折。

title: 今天超市芒果大特价啦

conversations.english: Can you direct me to some fresh produce that's on sale?
conversations.chinese: 能告诉我哪里能买到正在打折的新鲜的水果吗？
conversations.reply_english: Well, we've got some great mangoes on sale.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，我们有很不错的芒果正在打折。

title: 请问有机蔬菜酱油分别在超市哪道

conversations.english: We need to buy some beer too. Where is the beer?
conversations.chinese: 我们还需要买一些啤酒，啤酒在哪里？
conversations.reply_english: They don't have beer in this supermarket. We have to go to the liquor store.
conversations.reply_chinese: 超市是不卖啤酒的，我们要到卖酒的店买才行。

title: 请问购物篮在哪能找到

conversations.english: Excuse me, could you tell me where I can get a shopping basket?
conversations.chinese: 打扰了，你可以告诉我哪里可以拿到购物篮吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, Madam. It is at the entrance.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，女士。在入口那里。

title: 我今天要订购很多食物

conversations.english: Anybody here?
conversations.chinese: 有人在吗？
conversations.reply_english: Coming, I'm coming! Hi Susan. What do you want today?
conversations.reply_chinese: 来了，我来啦！苏珊你好。今天你要买什么？

title: 你能帮我买点儿黄油回来吗

conversations.english: Willy,I don't think we have much butter.Can you buy some?
conversations.chinese: 威利，我们的黄油不多了，你能去买点吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure,Mum.In a minute.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然，妈妈。我马上就去。

title: 欢迎光临艾尔面包店

conversations.english: Welcome to Al's Bakery. What can I get you?
conversations.chinese: 欢迎来到艾尔面包店。我能为你做些什么？
conversations.reply_english: Hi! Let me get a dozen croissants, four blueberry muffins and a loaf of sourdough bread.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗨！给我来个羊角面包，4个蓝莓的松饼和一条酸面包。

title: 今天芒果全部半价出售

conversations.english: Hi. I'm looking for some good deals on produce.
conversations.chinese: 嗨，我在找一些价廉物美的食物。
conversations.reply_english: You might want to try the mangoes.
conversations.reply_chinese: 也许你可以尝试一下芒果。

title: 哪有卖便宜的新鲜水果

conversations.english: Where is some fresh produce that's on sale?
conversations.chinese: 哪里有卖新鲜并在打折的食物？
conversations.reply_english: Well, I think you'll like the mangoes.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，我想你会喜欢芒果的。

title: 我们的卖的是出产自墨西哥的芒果

conversations.english: I'm looking for some fresh produce that's on sale.
conversations.chinese: 我在找一些特价并且新鲜的食物。
conversations.reply_english: Well, we just got in some mangoes.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，我们刚刚进了一些芒果。

title: 去熟食店买点东西

conversations.english: Honey, we are all out of wine and cheese. Do you mind running to the deli and picking up a few things?
conversations.chinese: 亲爱的，我们没有酒和奶酪了。你介意去趟熟食店买点东西吗？
conversations.reply_english: Can’t it wait? I’m watching the game right now!
conversations.reply_chinese: 不能等会吗？我正在看比赛呢。

title: 我们卖的牛肉是刚从屠宰场运来的

conversations.english: Hi. What can I get for you?
conversations.chinese: 你好，想买点什么？
conversations.reply_english: I’d like a half a pound of ground beef, please.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我要半磅碎牛肉.

title: 让我们一起去超市买点儿菜回来吧

conversations.english: Mom, where are you going？
conversations.chinese: 妈妈，你要去哪里？
conversations.reply_english: I am going to buy some food to cook for supper.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我正要去买菜做晚饭。

title: 让孩子自己去买牛肉

conversations.english: Excuse me, how much is the spinage?
conversations.chinese: 请问，菠菜怎么卖？
conversations.reply_english: 3 Yuan per kilogram.
conversations.reply_chinese: 每公斤三块钱。
